languages.text: {n}Клинок стирает из ее черт власть и право приказывать. Толпа с ужасом смотрит на ту, за которую минуту назад готовы были умереть. Увидев, сколько легко была низвергнута ее власть, они устрашены.{/n}

{n}Faced with the blade, all the strength and authority have been erased from her features. The crowd looks on in horror at the one whom, just moments ago, they had been willing to die for. They have seen how easily her power was overthrown, and they are seized with fear.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Клинок стирает из ее черт власть и право приказывать. Толпа с ужасом смотрит на ту, за которую минуту назад готовы были умереть. Увидев, сколько легко была низвергнута ее власть, они устрашены.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The blade erases the power and the right to command from her features. The crowd stares in horror at the one they were willing to die for just moments ago. They see how easily her power has been overthrown, and they are horrified.{/n}

{n}The blade erases the power and the right to command from her features. The crowd stares in horror at the one they were willing to die for just moments ago. They see how easily her power has been overthrown, and they are horrified.{/n}

{n}Faced with the blade, all the strength and authority have been erased from her features. The crowd looks on in horror at the one whom, just moments ago, they had been willing to die for. They have seen how easily her power was overthrown, and they are seized with fear.{/n}

{n}Faced with the blade, all the strength and authority have been erased from her features. The crowd looks on in horror at the one whom, just moments ago, they had been willing to die for. They have seen how easily her power was overthrown, and they are seized with fear.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Angesichts der Klinge verschwindet jede Stärke und Autorität aus ihren Zügen. Die Menge blickt angsterfüllt auf sie, für die sie vor wenigen Momenten noch zu sterben bereit war. Sie hat nun gesehen, wie leicht ihre Macht gestürzt wurde, und Furcht greift um sich.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Faced with the blade, all the strength and authority have been erased from her features. The crowd looks on in horror at the one whom, just moments ago, they had been willing to die for. They have seen how easily her power was overthrown, and they are seized with fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Angesichts der Klinge verschwindet jede Stärke und Autorität aus ihren Zügen. Die Menge blickt angsterfüllt auf sie, für die sie vor wenigen Momenten noch zu sterben bereit war. Sie hat nun gesehen, wie leicht ihre Macht gestürzt wurde, und Furcht greift um sich.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Frente a mi hoja, toda fuerza y autoridad desaparece de sus facciones. La multitud observa horrorizada a la persona por la que estaban dispuestos a morir hasta hace un momento. Han visto la facilidad con la que pierde su poder y están aterrados.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Faced with the blade, all the strength and authority have been erased from her features. The crowd looks on in horror at the one whom, just moments ago, they had been willing to die for. They have seen how easily her power was overthrown, and they are seized with fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Frente a mi hoja, toda fuerza y autoridad desaparece de sus facciones. La multitud observa horrorizada a la persona por la que estaban dispuestos a morir hasta hace un momento. Han visto la facilidad con la que pierde su poder y están aterrados.{/n}

languages.text: {n}刃を前にして、彼女の顔からは力強さも威厳も消え失せていた。群衆は、ついさっきまで嬉々として自分たちのために命を奪おうとしていた人物を恐怖の眼差しで見つめる。彼女の力がいとも簡単に抑え込まれるのを目の当たりにして、恐怖心に包まれたのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Faced with the blade, all the strength and authority have been erased from her features. The crowd looks on in horror at the one whom, just moments ago, they had been willing to die for. They have seen how easily her power was overthrown, and they are seized with fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}刃を前にして、彼女の顔からは力強さも威厳も消え失せていた。群衆は、ついさっきまで嬉々として自分たちのために命を奪おうとしていた人物を恐怖の眼差しで見つめる。彼女の力がいとも簡単に抑え込まれるのを目の当たりにして、恐怖心に包まれたのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}面对我手中的利刃，她脸上所有的力量与权威都消失不见了。人群惊恐地看着面前这个少女，而就在刚刚，这些人还打算为她拼死而战。所有人都看到，她的权力是多么容易被人推翻，那些人心中充满了恐惧。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Faced with the blade, all the strength and authority have been erased from her features. The crowd looks on in horror at the one whom, just moments ago, they had been willing to die for. They have seen how easily her power was overthrown, and they are seized with fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}面对我手中的利刃，她脸上所有的力量与权威都消失不见了。人群惊恐地看着面前这个少女，而就在刚刚，这些人还打算为她拼死而战。所有人都看到，她的权力是多么容易被人推翻，那些人心中充满了恐惧。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La vue d'une lame l'a vidée de toute sa force et de toute son autorité. La foule regarde avec horreur celle pour qui elle était prête à mourir quelques instants plus tôt. Tous ont vu avec quelle facilité son emprise a été anéantie, et ils sont saisis par la crainte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Faced with the blade, all the strength and authority have been erased from her features. The crowd looks on in horror at the one whom, just moments ago, they had been willing to die for. They have seen how easily her power was overthrown, and they are seized with fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La vue d'une lame l'a vidée de toute sa force et de toute son autorité. La foule regarde avec horreur celle pour qui elle était prête à mourir quelques instants plus tôt. Tous ont vu avec quelle facilité son emprise a été anéantie, et ils sont saisis par la crainte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kılıçla yüz yüze kalınca çehresindeki tüm güç ve otorite ifadesi siliniyor. Kalabalık, birkaç dakika öncesine kadar uğruna ölümü göze aldıkları kişiye dehşet içinde bakakalıyor. Gücünün ne kadar kolayca alaşağı edilebildiğini görmeleriyle korkunun esiri oluyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Faced with the blade, all the strength and authority have been erased from her features. The crowd looks on in horror at the one whom, just moments ago, they had been willing to die for. They have seen how easily her power was overthrown, and they are seized with fear.{/n}
